briefTitle: Regional Prophylactic Vancomycin With Restricted Tourniquet Time in Primary Total Knee Replacement

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria

Primary Total Knee Arthroplasty for osteoarthritis Informed consent given

Exclusion Criteria

Current or treatment with IV Vancomycin within preceding 7 days Previous hypersensitivity to vancomycin Significant cardiac or respiratory abnormality Patient has contraindications to IO vascular access using the EZ-IO

outcomeMeasures.title: Vancomycin Concentration in Fat
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean vancomycin concentration in fat measured in ug/g at surgical closure

outcomeMeasures.title: Vancomycin Concentration in Bone
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean vancomycin concentration in bone measured in ug/g at surgical closure
